1519700.name: Haunted Nightmares Soundtrack
1519700.description:
This soundtrack was produced specifically for the nightmares in Haunted Nightmares, and their respective uniqueness and the special atmosphere on it.


The compositions should not sound like what music sounds like today, but rather like music in nightmares could sound like.

The individual tracks were composed by Frank Gallinsky @ Artist Tonstudio Reutlingen.
The complete experience you get in this DLC ...
